"@magda seguin I was supporting Zuma @makhosi...we are all very traumatised and pained as ex ANC voters Zuma creates a bill to protect information which is was to protect his shenanigans because they were shocked by revelation of Nkandla scandal Its like they blackmail them I already decided that the Polokwane mess was the end and decided that I will never vote for the ruling party ...I have become apolitical Magda Seguin I told myself I will vote for other party to give Anc lessons as we did in 2016 because there was no hears to listen but after Ramaphosa won I come back home coz I know him very well "@STEFAN VAN DEN BERG The commission's investigators are giving information to the NPA Administration and policy implementation will happen in supervisory and no corruption will happen as you see him pushing very hard to bring back wat we have lost "@STEFAN VAN DEN BERG.
